quote: The accumulation of grief over one lifetime is more then one heart can bear.""Robert explained.""Only the heartless could withstand more.Or the very young,those too naive to truly understand loss.
quote_letters: THE ACCUMULATION OF GRIEF OVER ONE LIFETIME IS MORE THEN ONE HEART CAN BEARROBERT EXPLAINEDONLY THE HEARTLESS COULD WITHSTAND MOREOR THE VERY YOUNGTHOSE TOO NAIVE TO TRULY UNDERSTAND LOSS
